short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize, manage and search your Claude AI conversations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Claude Chat Manager 🤖
Supercharge your Claude.ai experience with powerful organization, search, and export capabilities - all while keeping your conversations private and secure!

Key Features ⭐
Smart Organization 📂

- Create unlimited folders to organize your chats
- Support for nested folders and subfolders
- Special project folders for better workflow management
- Quick-access side panel with keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+Shift+S)
- Automatic chat collection and organization

Powerful Search 🔍

- Instant full-text search across all your conversations
- Search through chat content, titles, and project names
- Real-time results with highlighted matches
- Keep track of everything Claude has ever helped you with

Flexible Export Options 💾

- Export conversations in multiple formats:
  - Plain Text (TXT) for simplicity
  - HTML for formatted viewing
  - Markdown for documentation
  - JSON for data analysis

- Preserve chat structure and metadata
- Batch export capabilities

Privacy First 🔒

- All data stored locally in your browser
- No external servers or cloud storage
- Your conversations stay private and secure
- Works directly with Claude's interface

Perfect For:
Researchers 🔬

Organize research conversations by topic
Keep track of different experiments
Export conversations for papers and documentation

Developers 👩‍💻

Manage coding projects separately
Store code snippets and explanations
Export solutions in markdown for documentation

Writers ✍️

Organize writing projects
Keep track of creative discussions
Export conversations for reference

Students 📚

Organize study sessions by subject
Keep track of learning progress
Export explanations for study notes

Business Users 💼

Manage multiple client projects
Keep track of business strategies
Export conversations for reporting

Additional Features

- Quick save functionality
- Real-time folder statistics
- Project tagging and identification
- Intuitive drag-and-drop interface
- Automatic chat backup
- Custom keyboard shortcuts
- Batch processing capabilities

Start organizing your Claude conversations today and never lose track of important discussions again! 🚀
Note: This extension works with Claude.ai and requires a Claude account to function.
